short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NTRglobal remote control extension that adds remote control to HEAT Service Management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension contains the files that create a remote control session in a web browser for the HEAT Service Management application. It uses the HEAT Service Management remote control libraries that the user must install on the system. To reduce processing time, the extension checks if there is already a version of the NTRglobal remote control application and only downloads it if there is not.
